channel.title: Grownups Read Things They Wrote as Kids
channel.description: Remembering the good, the bad, and the awkward parts of growing up. Since 2007.

item.title: 227: "Before I die, I want to have sex" (Toronto)
item.description: Heather gets a fart-related nickname, Andru takes a risky trip to second base, Brian writes a sharply worded letter to the editor, and much more. Recorded live at The Tranzac Club in Toronto, ON.
item.itunes:summary:
Heather gets a fart-related nickname, Andru takes a risky trip to second base, Brian writes a sharply worded letter to the editor, and much more. Recorded live at The Tranzac Club in Toronto, ON.
